title.value: Category values for the clinFHIR Scenario Library

description.value: The categories that can be applied to a scenario (represented as a DocumentReference)

definition.value: The default category that a scenario is assigned to. Will be removed when not needed.
A scenario that describes a particular way, or pattern, of representing a particualar clinical need. Should be retained indefinately.
Used during the 'Clinicians on FHIR' events at the HL7 Working Group Meetings
A category used to hold scenarios developed during a training session. The expectation is that these will be removed once the session is complete.
